summary: The kedro/io package implements the core data I/O framework for Kedro, defining abstract dataset contracts, version handling, and catalog operations, while providing utilities for configuration resolution and a suite of dataset implementations (cached, in‑memory, shared‑memory, lambda, etc.). It enables consistent, version‑aware loading and saving of data assets through a centralized, dictionary‑like catalog.
business_intent: To give Kedro users a flexible, extensible system for managing data assets in pipelines, supporting version control, configurable dataset definitions, and interchangeable storage backends, thereby simplifying data engineering and machine‑learning workflow orchestration.
